text: is a Japanese anime series by Nippon Animation. It is a part of the World Masterpiece Theater series. It consists of 51 episodes. It was aired on Fuji TV between January 12 and December 28, 1986. Animax ran the show again across Japan from February 2007.Animax.co.jp , Pollyanna airing schedule, retrieved on 2007-09-25 It was based on the 1913 novel Pollyanna and 1915 sequel Pollyanna Grows Up by Eleanor H. Porter. ==Episodes== # Episode Title Original air date ==References== Category:Anime and manga
title: The Story of Pollyanna, Girl of Love
